siteMetadata.title: Custom Elements
siteMetadata.description: Samples of the HTML web pages that can be used as Custom Element (BETA) Extensions in Kentico Cloud. Custom elements help you with extending the basic functionality of Kentico Cloud UI and thus improving the content editing experience. Custom element is essentially a small HTML application that exists in a sandboxed <iframe> and interacts with the Kentico Cloud app via the Custom Elements API.

node.title: Components
node.description: In Kentico Cloud there is linked items element as well as linked items as a part of the rich text. Then there are components as a part of the rich text, but there are components missing as a stand-alone element so editors can't create as many components as they need with no related items created.

node.title: Markdown
node.description: Markdown editor is a WYSIWYG Custom element which allows users to write formatted text using SimpleMDE. In this sample element, you can find examples of setting dynamic height and reacting on the window ‘resize’ events. When the element is disabled, the editor is set to the readonly mode.

node.title: Bing Image Picker
node.description: The Bing image picker allows to search images on Bing and use them in your website.

node.title: Color Picker
node.description: Color picker allowing user to choose a color from palette and sets it as a HEX string, e.g. '#ff0000' for red color, '#00ff00' for green, and so on.

node.title: Country State Selector
node.description: Country and state selector is a drop down selector which allows users to select country and state (if country has any).

node.title: Date Picker
node.description: This is a simple calendar control based on jQuery UI DatePicker which lets you pick a date.

node.title: Geoloation Leaflet
node.description: This KC custom element allows you to put a marker on a map and it automatically gets converted to latitude and longitude geo locations.

node.title: Giphy Picker
node.description: The Giphy picker allows to search images on Giphy and use them in your website.

node.title: Flickr Image Picker
node.description: The Flickr image picker allows to search images on Flickr and use them in your website.

node.title: Magento Product Selector
node.description: Magento product selector is a selector connected to Magento instance which allows users to search and select a product from Magento product catalog.

node.title: Optimizely Audience selector
node.description: Optimizely audiences selector is a selector connected to Optimizely API which allows users to search and select audiences from Optimizely.

node.title: Icon Selector
node.description: In Kentico Cloud, an icon selector can be specified by using the `Multiple Choice` content element. But this lacks in usablility as the content author has to guess what icon will be displayed when a particular choice is made. The icon selector hopes to make the life of the content editor easier with an easy to use dropdown of icons.

node.title: Shopify selector
node.description: Shopify product selector is a selector connected to Shopify Storefront which allows users to search and select a product from Shopify product catalog.

node.title: Switch
node.description: The Bing image picker allows to search images on Bing and use them in your website.

node.title: Syntax Highlighter
node.description: Syntax Highlighter is an editable text area enhanced by the Ace Code Editor to provide a programmer-friendly environment for writing code examples. Offers a fine selection of programming languages to be highlighted.

node.title: Unsplash Images Selector
node.description: This is a custom element for Kentico Cloud that allows users to search and select high-quality, royalty-free images from Unsplash.

node.title: Toas UI Editor
node.description: Toast UI editor is based on Toast UI Editor. It is a Markdown WYSIWYG Editor including GFM Standard + Chart & UML Extensible.

node.title: WYSIWYG Quill
node.description: This KC custom element is based on the Quill rich text editor. It stores content in JSON format, so it's omni-channel friendly.

node.title: Youtube Video Selector
node.description: YouTube video selector allows users to search and select videos from YouTube.

node.title: WYSIWYG Summernote
node.description: This KC custom element is based on the Summernote rich text editor. It allows you to switch to the Source code mode to edit or see the HTML markup!

node.title: Youtube Video Preview
node.description: This KC custom element allows you to add various types of Youtube video url, it extracts the video id for your apps and shows the video.

node.title: Ipsum Input
node.description: The ipsum input allows you to quickly add ipsum content to your input fields.
